law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Authority" means a corporation incorporated in accordance with this subtitle to act as a local redevelopment authority in accordance with criteria set by the United States Department of Defense or its military services under the federal Defense Base Closure and Realignment Act of 1990.

"Authority" does not include:
Bainbridge Development Corporation;
Holabird Working Group/Baltimore Development Corporation (BDC); or
PenMar Development Corporation.

text.section: "Board" means the Board of Directors of an authority.

section.section: "Bond" means a bond or note issued on behalf of an authority under this subtitle.

text.section: "Improve" means to add, alter, construct, equip, expand, extend, improve, install, reconstruct, rehabilitate, remodel, or repair.
"Improvement" means addition, alteration, construction, equipping, expansion, extension, improvement, installation, reconstruction, rehabilitation, remodeling, or repair.

section.section: "Person" has the meaning stated in § 9-101 of this article.

"Project" means an undertaking to establish economic activity under this subtitle on property to be conveyed to an authority by the United States Department of Defense or a military service, whether or not a facility or property used or useful in connection with the undertaking:
is or will be used for profit or not for profit;
is located on a single site or multiple sites; or
may be financed by bonds, the interest on which is exempt from taxation under federal law.
"Revenues" means the income, revenue, and other money an authority receives from or in connection with a project.
"Revenues" includes grants, rentals, rates, fees, and charges for the use of the services furnished or available.
